early_scenarios.title: Your First Customer
early_scenarios.text: A friendly local approaches your truck with a big smile. They're excited to try your food but seem unsure about what to order from your menu.

choices.label: Let them browse while you prep for next customer

early_scenarios.title: Permit Renewal Notice
early_scenarios.text: You receive a reminder that your business permit expires in two weeks. The renewal fee is due, and you need to plan for the paperwork.

choices.label: Renew immediately to avoid any issues
Wait until closer to deadline to preserve cash flow
Research if there are any renewal discounts available

mid_scenarios.title: Equipment Upgrade Opportunity
mid_scenarios.text: A restaurant supply company is offering a deal on a new high-efficiency grill that could speed up your cooking time by 30%, but it's a significant investment.

choices.label: Purchase the new grill with financing
Negotiate a trial period before committing
Stick with current equipment to preserve capital

mid_scenarios.title: Severe Weather Warning
mid_scenarios.text: A severe thunderstorm warning has been issued for the next 4 hours. You're in the middle of lunch prep with ingredients that will spoil if not used today.

choices.label: Try to find a covered location to continue service
Stay put and serve through the weather

late_scenarios.title: Second Truck Opportunity
late_scenarios.text: A successful food truck owner is retiring and has offered to sell you their established truck, customer base, and prime location permit at a fair price.

choices.label: Take the loan and buy the second truck
Propose a partnership instead of outright purchase
Focus on perfecting your current operation

late_scenarios.title: Viral Social Media Moment
late_scenarios.text: A food blogger's video of your truck has gone viral overnight. You're expecting massive crowds but your current setup can't handle the volume.

choices.label: Hire temporary staff and stock extra supplies
Offer a simplified menu to handle volume
Continue normal operations and let people wait
